method.name: setup
method.shortDescription: Transmits the settings to the internal core.
method.description: Transmits the settings to the internal core. @param cfg { Object } Object literal containing settings for the Source Viewer.

method.name: viewSource
method.shortDescription: The main method to be called by the client programmer. Opens the Source Viewer UI and lists the first level of source files
method.description: The main method to be called by the client programmer. Opens the Source Viewer UI and lists the first level of source files
